review: its just not there yet  the concept is good and a lot of the game works but there are just some things that need to be patched before i can recommend this  melee stealth still seems to be broken to the point that its not even worth using  there are memory issues that cause artifacting and slow loading  shader caching takes longer than most other games and the steam cloud sync save is completely busted  i will amend my review once the games gets patched up
game_title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon
